doc.title: Last Days in Iraq

directors.director: de la Vega II, Vicente de Jesus

producers.producer: de la Vega II, Vicente de Jesus

writers.writer: de la Vega II, Vicente de Jesus

doc.plot: Ben, a United States Marine, has been home for a couple of weeks after serving in Iraq. His doctors and family have been trying to help him readjust to life in the States. However, Ben is having a difficult time leaving his room, and more specifically, his head. Sitting in his room, Ben hears a plane fly overhead and is instantly brought back to the war. As his two worlds collide, Ben must fight against having the life he left behind drastically affect his current reality.
